metadata.title: CVE-2020-26142 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the kernel in OpenBSD 6.6. The WEP, WPA, WPA2, and WPA3 implementations treat fragmented frames as full frames. An adversary can abuse this to inject arbitrary network packets, independent of the network configuration.

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
